title: Tsumurin: Funkoro Yakata ni Okurimono

synonyms: Tsumurin: A Story About Going to Give a Gift to Master Funkoro
alternative_titles.en: Tsumurin: Presenting A Gift to Master Funkoro
alternative_titles.ja: つむりん　ふんころおやかたに　おくりもの

synopsis:
Tsumurin was adventuring in the forest when he found an amazing treasure! He'd love to give it to his friend, the Master Funkoro. He lives a long way from the forest. It's the start of another adventure!

(Source: YouTube)
